result.execSummary:
The defendant Isom Brumfield Jr was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Isom Brumfield Jr is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Isom Brumfield Jr was found guilty of Felon Possess Firearm, a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 941.29(2)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Injury by Negligent Handling of Dangerous Weapon, Explosives or Fire

IT IS HEREBY ORDERED that the Judgment of Conviction be amended/modified to provide medical release to the above named defendant as part of his work release sentence.
Per Order of the Presiding Judge, Felony Division, this motion/request is hereby assigned to the Hon. Frederick C. Rosa, Br. 35, for review. crt
MOTION TO MODIFY SENTENCE.
SCHIRO & ZARZYNSKI - Wisconsin Trial Lawyers.
Bail Refund Packets
NOTICE OF RIGHT TO SEEK POST-CONVICTION RELIEF filed.

Defendant Isom Brumfield in court with attorney John Scott Schiro.  Denis John Stingl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant ordered to serve 12 months in the House of Correction with credit of 7 days time served, and with Huber Privileges for work.  
Defendant has a report date of 6.29.15 before 12pm.
Court ordered defendant to pay all applicable court costs and surcharges to be taken from bail on deposit.
Defendant shall provide a DNA sample for the Data Bank and pay all appropriate costs to be taken from bail on deposit (remaining balance to be returned to the person who posted it).
Filed,
Pretrial Incarceration Credit.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.
for Sentencing.

Defendant Isom Brumfield in court with attorney John Scott Schiro.  Denis John Stingl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Court ordered case adjourned for sentencing in Branch 7.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for 06-24-2015 at 01:30 pm.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Isom Brumfield in court with attorney John Scott Schiro.  Denis John Stingl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
On State's motion, Court ordered COUNT 1 DISMISSED.
AS TO COUNT 2:  Defendant changes plea to GUILTY. Defendant examined as to his plea, advised of his Constitutional rights and the maximum penalty. Court found that defendant freely, voluntarily and intelligently waived his rights. Plea questionnaire received and filed. Parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis to sustain defendant's plea. Court found defendant guilty as charged in the information and ordered a Judgment of Conviction be entered on the record. Defendant is advised he is a convicted felon and may not possess any firearms. Defendant is advised he is unable to vote in any election until civil rights are restored. Defendant further advised that if he is not a US citizen deportation is possible.  Defendant shall provide a DNA sample for the Data Bank.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for 05-01-2015 at 01:30 pm.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Isom Brumfield in court with attorney John Scott Schiro.  Hanna R. Kolberg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Court ordered case adjourned for jury trial in Branch 7.  Jury trial scheduled for 03-02-2015 at 08:30 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Report dated November 21, 2014, received and filed.

Defendant Isom Brumfield in court with attorney John Scott Schiro.  Hanna Kolberg for Denis Stingl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case scheduled for Jury Trial. State requests adjournment as ADA Stingl is in another Court for a Speedy Jury Trial.
Case is adjourned for a Scheduling Conference to allow scheduling to take place in front of Judge McAdams on 12-9-2014 at 8:30 a.m., Br. 7.
Parties are notified that effective December 1, 2014, this case will be assigned to Judge Thomas McAdams, Branch 7, in Room 629 of the Courthouse. 
Note:  Court REITERATES that the defendant MAINTAIN Absolute Sobriety and NOT possess or use any controlled substances unless by valid prescription. Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.  Scheduling conference scheduled for December 9, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Defendant's Motion in Limine, received and filed.
State's Requested Jury Instructions, State's Witness List, and State's Motion in Limine, received and filed.

Defendant Isom Brumfield in court with attorney John Scott Schiro.  Denis Stingl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Final Pretrial Proceeds. Case remains calendared for Jury Trial on 11-24-2014 at 9:00 a.m., Br. 17.
Justice Point Pretrial Report dated October 22, 2014, received and filed.
Milwaukee County Pretrial Services Violation Report, received and filed.

Case recalled.
Attorney John Scott Schiro in Court. Paul M. Hauer for Denis Stingl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Attorney Stingl notified the Court that he is unavailable on 11-10-2014 for the Jury Trial. New date set for Jury Trial of 11-24-2014 at 9:00.m. Case is adjourned for Final Pretrial on 10-23-2014 at 8:30 a.m. and Jury Trial on 11-24-2014 at 9:00 a.m., Br. 17.

Defendant Isom Brumfield in court with attorney John Scott Schiro.  Paul M. Hauer appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defense counsel has received discovery and offer.  Felony Pretrial Scheduling Order previously signed and filed.  Case is adjourned for Final Pretrial Conference on 10-23-2014 at 8:30 a.m. and Jury Trial on 11-10-2014 at 9:00 a.m., Br. 17. 
  Final pre-trial scheduled for October 23, 2014 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for November 10, 2014 at 09:00 am.  Jury trial scheduled for November 24, 2014 at 09:00 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Report dated August 25, 2014, received and filed.

Request for Substitution of Judge received and filed.  Court consented to substitution against Judge Siefert.  Parties are advised the Clerk of Circuit Court reassigned case pursuant to current court rules to Judge Stark, Br. 17.

Defendant Isom Brumfield in court with attorney John Scott Schiro. Laura Crivello for Denis Stingl appeared for the State of Wisconsin./ SAB
The defendant was injured and is having surgery. Court grants defense request for an adjournment.   Parties advised effective August 2, 2014, this case will be reassigned to Judge Siefert, Branch 47, Room 629 of the Courthouse.

Original Information filed.  Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant pled not guilty. Court ordered case adjourned for Scheduling Conference in Branch 15.  Scheduling conference scheduled for March 6, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Isom Brumfield in court with attorney Mary Garvin Guimont.  Defendant Isom Brumfield in custody.  William Pipp appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Watts, Branch 15.
Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.
